<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function useExtensions<Incoming extends NamespacedApis, Outgoing extends NamespacedApis = NamespacedApis>(configFactory: (host: Host) => UseExtensionsConfig<Incoming, Outgoing>, deps?: unknown[]): UseExtensionsResult<Incoming>;
```
